Translations.Text: Ara ratera kichu anse tamra prati sajdabanata hona ara ratera dirgha samaya tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna
Niscaya tara bhalabase duniyara jibanake ara tara tadera samanera kathina dinake upeksa kare cale
Amara taderake srsti karechi ebam tadera gathana sudrrha karechi. Ara amara yakhana icche karaba tadera sthane tadera mata (ka'uke) diye paribartana kare deba
Niscaya eta eka upadesa, ata'eba ye icche kare se yena tara rabera dike ekati patha grahana kare
Ara tomara icche karate saksama habe na yadi na allah icche karena. Niscaya allah sarbajna, prajnamaya
Tini yake icche tamra anugrahera antarbhukta karena, kintu yalemara- tadera jan'ya tini prastuta rekhechena yantranadayaka sasti
Sapatha kalyanasbarupa prerita bayura
atahpara pralayankari jhatikara
sapatha pracanda sancalanakarira
atahpara suspastarupe parthakyakarira
atahpara tadera, yara manusera antare paumche deya upadesa
oyara-apatti rahitakarana o satarka karara jan'ya
Niscaya tomaderake ye pratisruti deya hayeche ta abasyambhabi
Yakhana naksatrarajira alo nirbapita kara habe
ara yakhana akasa bidirna kara habe
ara yakhana parbatamala curnabicurna kara habe
ara yakhana rasulaganake nirdharita samaye upasthita kara habe
esaba sthagita rakha hayeche kon dinera jan'ya
bicara dinera jan'ya
Ara apanake kise janabe bicara dina ki
sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
Amara ki purbabartiderake dhbansa karini
tarapara amara parabartiderake tadera anugami karaba
Aparadhidera prati amara erupa'i kare thaki
Sedina durbhoga mithyaropakaridera jan'ya
